# SynSigEval

<!-- badges: start -->

[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/WuyangFF95/SynSigEval.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/WuyangFF95/SynSigEval)

<!-- badges: end -->

Assess the performance of mutational-signature analysis
programs Using catalogs of synthetic mutational spectra created
by package [SynSigGen](https://github.com/steverozen/SynSigGen).

## Installation

Install the development version of SynSigRun from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with the R command line:

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("WuyangFF95/SynSigEval")
```

## Reference manual

https://github.com/WuyangFF95/SynSigEval/blob/master/data-raw/SynSigEval_0.0.4.9001.pdf
